text: i uznal tekh, kotoryye litsemeryat. I skazano bylo im: "Prikhodite, srazhaytes' na puti Allakha ili otgonite!" Oni skazali: "Yesli by my znali srazheniye, my posledovali by za vami". Oni v tot den' - blizhe k neveriyu, chem k vere! Oni govoryat svoimi ustami to, chego net u nikh v serdtse, a Allakh luchshe znayet to, chto oni skryvayut
